subject: Re: Order #SSN1543, how did it go?
description_text:
No sign of the order yet, ordered May 28.
I'd love to tell you it looks great but sorry, nothing to see here.
I did install the latest software and that shows no sign of the Haptics
either, so I'm not sure I'll be able to run them when when they turn up?

King regards,
Wayne

On Wed, 2 July 2025, 2:10 pm SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Wayne, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Wayne Shephard,     This is the physical trajectory data.

Hi Wayne Shephard,    I noticed that you haven’t received the product yet and have already left a 1-star review. I’d like to take this opportunity to explain:  Our SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8 currently supports 10 mainstream racing games, and SIMHUB version 9.9.3 now officially supports SIMSONN pedals, with compatibility for over 100 racing titles.  If you're using Pro Plus pedals with the PlusX controller, everything should work perfectly. Once you receive the pedals, please follow this order: First, connect all three pedals, then plug in the USB. After that, open the software and perform a factory Offset, followed by calibration of your pedals.  Our vibration strength is 0.75kg, which is higher than Simagic's 0.45kg. Our power supply is rated at 3A, also higher than Simagic’s 2.2A. Overall, our system offers better performance. We're focused on providing a well-optimized solution specifically for our own pedal customers, at a much more affordable price point compared to Simagic’s high-end pricing.  We welcome you to reassess the product, and if you have any issues, we’re always here to assist you. Thank you for your understanding and support.

Cheers, I certainly will revise the 1 star when the gear arrives, unfortunately I sent a political email regarding your invite to reply and ask that came back was a tracking screenshot and no answers or explanation, hence my response.
Thankyou for taking the time to reply with some useful information.
I really do hope the Simsonn products deliver, they are very hard to find reviews for, so it's a punt from us early adopters.
Not the smoothest purchase I've made but it's new gear, so some expectation that it will be that way.

Thanks for replying with this info,  maybe you can just delete that 1 star review and I'll post one if and when it arrives and I get it going.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Wayne Shephard,  Due to a slight delay in the arrival of the second batch of VAM Pro motors, we’ve been receiving many follow-up emails about pending shipments, and we may have accidentally missed replying to yours—our apologies for that. Rest assured, the product quality is excellent. SIMHUB has fully supported our hardware and has updated their software accordingly. If you encounter any issues after receiving your order, feel free to contact me directly. More and more customers are now using the VAM Pro, and based on the feedback I see in emails every day, the reviews have been overwhelmingly positive. Hardware issues have been very rare, so you can use it with confidence.

Thankyou, great to have a healthy dialogue about your products.
I'll aim to provide some positive feedback too.

Kind regards,
Wayne Shephard

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
